page.title: 04Winter in Flash
page.content: Last winter there was a landrover stuck down our lane. The snow was one metre deep. We had to put a stone behind the wheel and put some grit on the road. We pushed it. The snow came suddenly and this is how the landrover got stuck. Another landrover came and tried to help us. He had a rope in his landrover. Ted hooked it onto his landrover and the other landrover pulled Ted's landrover out. And when he was pulled out Ted unhooked the rope and put it back in the landrover. The wind came harder and the snow came harder.
